/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on developing presumptive SC claims for undiagnosed illness and MUCMI, including
processing Gulf War disability claims
when to apply undiagnosed illness and MUCMI procedures
Section 5103 notice for undiagnosed illness and MUCMI claims
establishing Persian Gulf Veteran status
considering the 1117 corporate flash
handling discrepancies with the 1117 corporate flash
documenting Persian Gulf Veteran status
requesting medical evidence in a Persian Gulf Veteran claim
considering whether to clarify or corroborate lay statements
, and
action to take when the Veteran alleges exposure to environmental hazards but claims no disability
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B - Developing Presumptive Service Connection (SC) Claims from Persian Gulf Veterans
citation: Part VIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B
